channel.title: You guys are punishing your luck LoL!
channel.description: I hear many people that say some people are going to make a new aryan ppl are pushing there luck to much aryan Cannot BE DONE! Aryan is dead we cant even get the source code jagex has made a completely java system if im not wrong they even remade runescape and just saved the datebase! Soon scar will die 2 they will probably do something to the colors like putting lots of dots dif color similar to original etc, tbh this section is not worth it Aryan Is Dead R.I.P NO MORE ARYAN. Aryan will exist only when Jagex will leach :P like allways when our mouse cursor will download there source code aryan will Revive Once again R.I.P

item.title: You guys are punishing your luck LoL!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

it probably is crackable just itll take a while for someone to crack the new engine, if i was jagex i’d start another section of the company to design a new engine, incase they start seeing another java bot popup

Read full topic

item.title: You guys are punishing your luck LoL!
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

[quote=“xerozcheez, post:14, topic:3317”][quote author=PaulT link=topic=3882.msg38199#msg38199 date=1148672394]

I’m suprised they managed to catch people who just logged in on aryan

Aryan was super detectable for obvious reasons.
[/quote]

Such as? I know it was easy to catch the people who used it to auto, but I thought most of the traps from logging in were disabled :rolleyes:[/quote]

Take a look at the source code. They’ve commented it quite thoroughly; read and it will become apparent.

Read full topic

@xerozcheez wrote:

Jagex can’t kill off everything, I’m suprised they managed to catch people who just logged in on aryan (if I’m right they did), they can’t make SCAR useless, there will always be a way, the new client will be hard at first, but I’m sure when someone first decompiled the runescape client they saw it being very hard with it being obfuscated etc. and hard to understand anything

item.title: You guys are punishing your luck LoL!
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Not only am I going to punish my luck, I’m going to beat it like a redheaded bastard child. Mmmmhmmm.

hear many people that say some people are going to make a new aryan ppl are pushing there luck to much aryan Cannot BE DONE! Aryan is dead we cant even get the source code jagex has made a completely java system if im not wrong they even remade runescape and just saved the datebase! Soon scar will die 2 they will probably do something to the colors like putting lots of dots dif color similar to original etc, tbh this section is not worth it Aryan Is Dead R.I.P NO MORE ARYAN. Aryan will exist only when Jagex will leach Tongue like allways when our mouse cursor will download there source code aryan will Revive Once again R.I.P

Not only do you not know what you’re talking about, what you do know, you have got horribly wrong. Good luck.

item.title: You guys are punishing your luck LoL!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

GodLikePro:

ok let me ask can Scar be able to dont use the mouse and be invisible like aryan??

Im not sure how many Virtual machines you can run on a computer, but I would assume they use a lot of memory so probaly not as many as aryan(I could be very wrong), but using a virtual machine you can have several scar’s running. It shouldnt use the mouse if you only put it on VM’s… But still someone would have to confirm this.

Read full topic
